### Negate() {#a2abe5e7f029b63c7b1bd29ac231ef7fa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; Negator::Negate (bool LHSIsZero, bool IsNSW, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl">InstCombinerImpl</a> &amp; IC)</>}
  labels = {["nodiscard", "static"]}>
Attempt to negate <code>Root</code>.

Retuns nullptr if negation can&#39;t be performed, otherwise returns negated value.
